name: NEON SPEED
description:
NEON SPEED is a casual racing game.
You need to ride on a high speed between another cars on the road and earn points to improve your car later.
You can choose the best car that will absolutely fits you!



Game Features:
  • Unique setting
  • Exciting gameplay
  • Lots of neon lighted locations to race in
  • Big collection of cool cars to choose
  • Incredible mechanics




ALL CHARACTERS IN THE GAME ARE OVER 18 YEARS OLD
